page.title: 18HOME LIFE
page.content: I enjoy Indian meals most. Now and again my mum phones up the Indian restaurant and orders us one. It is a bit spicey and hot though. I like the tandori chicken and rice that is served with it. It must take a while for the chef to cook because they have a rather long menu. I like lemon_ices, they are very refreshing when you are hot. I usually buy one when the ice_ cream man comes around. We eat our dinner at the table, but when we have something like sandwiches or soup we eat it in the living_room, on the coffee table. We always have the television on when we are having our dinner, as it keeps us amused. When we are in a hurry we have rather quick meals which are easy to prepare.
